summary.para: Gets the friendly name for the sensor associated with the report.

param.name: FriendlyName
param.para: The string into which the sensor friendly name is written.

param.name: cchFriendlyName
param.para: The character count of the FriendlyName string.

param.name: pcchWritten
param.para: Receives the number of characters that were written into the FriendlyName string.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Gets an object representing the current process activity of a sensor.

param.name: Index
param.para: The index of the to retrieve. This value must be less than the value returned by .

param.name: ppProcessActivity
param.para: A pointer to the associated with the specified index.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Gets the count of objects, representing the current activity of a process associated with the sensor, that are available to be retrieved.

param.name: pcCount
param.para: A pointer in which the process count is stored.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Gets the symbolic link for the sensor associated with the report.

param.name: SymbolicLink
param.para: The string into which the sensor symbolic link is written.

param.name: cchSymbolicLink
param.para: The character count of the SymbolicLink string.

param.name: pcchWritten
param.para: Receives the number of characters that were written into the SymbolicLink string.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

summary.para: Represents an activity report for a sensor.
